title: Manchester United v Everton: Premier League – live
summary: David Moyes makes his return to Old Trafford as Everton faces Manchester United in an exciting matchup. The game is being covered with a minute-by-minute report by Michael Butler. Fans can expect insights and updates as the action unfolds.

title: Ukraine makes significant changes to US ‘peace plan’, sources say
summary: Russia has revised its original 28-point proposal by removing some of its more extreme demands. This change suggests a possible shift in the negotiation strategy. The modifications may facilitate discussions with other involved parties.

title: White House insists Trump’s prosecutor was legally appointed after federal judge throws out Comey and James indictments – live
summary: Karoline Leavitt announced that the Department of Justice will appeal a judge's ruling which stated that Lindsey Halligan lacked the lawful authority to present indictments to both Comey and James. The ruling raises questions about the legality of the indictments. The appeal is expected to challenge the decision made by the court.

title: Ncuti Gatwa leads star winners at first Speakies awards for audio storytelling
summary: The inaugural British Audio Awards recognized the actor for Best Performance in the BBC drama "Gatsby in Harlem." Nicola Coughlan’s narration of Juno Dawson’s "Queen B" won Best Sci-Fi Audiobook. These awards celebrate excellence in audio storytelling.
